import { FC } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const Myposts: FC = () => { const { myPost } = useSelector((state: any) => state.data) if (myPost[0]) { switch (myPost[0].length) { case 0: return (
No posts yet

By : {result.infouser.username} Last update : {result.updatedAt} {result.title}
{result.content}
